detail_desc: Soft, non-wired bra in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jersey-lined, pull-on trousers in lightweight washed denim with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, frill-trimmed fake pockets and elasticated hems.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
Top in soft fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sturdy hand-braided straw bag and matching scarf. Bag with round handles at the top. Unlined. Size 17x30x33 cm.
Pencil skirt in a checked weave with a detachable fabric belt at the waist with a fabric-covered metal buckle, and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.

Shirt in a striped premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Square-necked top in crinkled jersey with elastication at the shoulders and short puff sleeves with an elasticated, overlocked frill trim.
Loose-fitting T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits at the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders with reverse-stitched seams, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Slightly shorter, wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative buttons on the shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, lightly crêped satin with a boat neck and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with embroidery down the sides and elasticated hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with imitation leather details and a lightly padded edge. Zip in the side and lacing at the front. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Tunic in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Suede mules with wide, crossover foot straps. Suede linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jersey body with a shaped V-neck with side support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top and a lined gusset.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with buttons down the front, two patch front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in textured jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and ties at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a sheen. Turtle neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Short coat in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Welt side pockets and a decorative tab at the cuffs. No buttons. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a satin top and lace trims around the armholes. Narrow cut at the top with an opening front and back and concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Short shoulder straps, a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with a ribbed turtleneck collar, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Gloves in soft leather with uppers in a soft, felted wool blend. Tab and adjustable fastening at the top and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section and tie detail at the back.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size approx. 7x16x27 cm.
Earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6 cm.

Blouse in an airy weave. Small stand-up collar with pleats at the front to create soft draping, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and pleats to create gentle volume. Lined.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Tuxedo trousers in stretch cotton-blend satin with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and side stripes down the legs. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leggings in soft, printed jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Body in microfibre and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Block-coloured top in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a round neck, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with elastication around the neckline, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with vertical flounces all round. Lined.
Cotton jersey T-shirt.
Pyjama shorts in soft, gently draping satin with covered elastication at the back of the waist and short slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top and a longer layer at the hem with a scalloped broderie anglaise trim.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.
Cycling shorts in ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
CONSCIOUS. 5-pocket washed denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a regular waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs, three pairs with pendants. Length from 1.5 cm to 4.5 cm.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and gently rounded hem.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a straight style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing with press-studs at the cuffs.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides, and a loop at the top, front and back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a small frill at the top, and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a frill trim.
Wide blouse in a patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top. Long, wide sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Long shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides, slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a glitter print. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
